Text: Taku Hairam, onu Taya, fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ ru Defid, kpai igbo oli sida kpʼamano̩do̩, kpʼamikapita ku ma fʼunyi ko̩ ñw u.
Oñ Defid li ka ku Jihofa fʼowñ e̩re̩ lonyane̩ kʼi chʼonu Israe̩l; todu o̩da ojane̩-wñ tʼate̩ ololo tod abo-wñ Israe̩l.
Oñ Defid ño̩ fʼamo̩ya omune̩ ne̩ Je̩rusale̩m, Defid laño̩ fʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩ bi ge̩.
Abu kʼodu odu amo̩ma-wñ ki ne̩ Je̩rusale̩m ko̩ de̩: Shamua kpai Shobab, Netan kpai So̩lo̩mo̩n
kpai Noga kpai Ne̩fe̩g kpai Jafaya
kpai E̩lishama kpai Bilayade kpai Ilife̩le̩t.
Oñ abo Filistia gbo̩ ka ku ma fʼekpo ba tu Defid oji kʼi mud onu abo Israe̩l chaka; tak abo Filistia chaka mute̩gu wa ku ma te̩jane̩ Defid. Defid la gbʼinabali-ma oñ i dufu nyʼakʼogu bʼuma.
Oñ abo Filistia lewa tala jo̩ ef o̩go̩ Re̩feim
Taku Defid tʼO̩jo̩ ene kakini, Omi ate̩gu nyʼakʼogu bʼabo Filistia? Uwe̩ akʼuma nyʼumi o̩wo̩? Taku Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, Te̩gu alo̩, kʼu nako ma nyʼef o̩wo̩-we̩.

Abe̩le̩ ma mute̩gu wa Beal-pe̩razim oñ Defid fʼuma gwoda o̩mo̩; taku Defid kakini, O̩jo̩ nʼo̩wo̩ e-mi fʼame̩ne̩bi-mi guche̩ me̩, alu kʼomi ako ugbo du le̩. Todule̩ oñ ma dʼodu ugbo kide̩ ko̩ Beal-pe̩razim.
Oñ ma hi amo̩jo̩-ma tinyo̩ jʼo̩mo̩, taku Defid ñwa ñwu ma, oñ ma nʼuna gʼuma jo rinyo̩.
Tak abo Filistia ño̩ dabi kʼo̩la-ma tala jo̩ ef o̩go̩ le̩.
Taku Defid ño̩ tʼO̩jo̩ ene; oñ O̩jo̩ ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ ki te̩gu nyʼo̩mo̩ agbe̩re̩ ma n; mudagbala kʼe̩ lewa bʼuma ma ugbo ujo̩ oli mulbe̩ri le̩.
Tak i ade̩ e̩gba kʼe̩ gbʼiche̩ e̩re̩ ki jʼoj oli mulbe̩ri alule̩, e̩gbale̩ tak uwe̩ adufu kʼe̩ jogu; todu O̩jo̩ dʼuwe̩ o̩gba le kʼi fʼabogu abo Filistia gwoda.
Taku Defid che alu kʼO̩jo̩ ñwa ñw u; oñ ma fʼabogu abo Filistia gwoda akwo Gibeo̩n gbogbo wa Geze̩r.
Tak uwohi Defid ledufu tʼojane̩ ojane̩ du; Jihofa la je̩ ñw ailo-wñ ki ba abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi chaka.
